Anomaly Packer

A tool for building type-safe addons with TypeScript

for S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Anomaly modders \(￣︶￣*\))

Read the docs
Contribute on GitHub

TypeScript to Lua

Transpilation step enables type-safe development with TypeScript and community-created type declaration files

TypeScript is optional

TS is a core feature of this tool, even though using it is not required

File-based packing

Building is file based, meaning the output will replicate the original gamedata with an exception of compiled TypeScript files

Do you want to hear a joke about pizza? Nevermind, it's too cheesy...
